gobblin.converter.filter

Class AvroFieldsPickConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<Schema,Schema,GenericRecord,GenericRecord>
      • gobblin.converter.AvroToAvroConverterBase
        • gobblin.converter.filter.AvroFieldsPickConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class AvroFieldsPickConverter
extends AvroToAvroConverterBase
    Converts schema and data by choosing only selected fields provided by user.

    • Method Detail

      • convertSchema

        public Schema convertSchema(Schema inputSchema,
                            WorkUnitState workUnit)
                     throws SchemaConversionException
        Convert the schema to contain only specified field. This will reuse AvroSchemaFieldRemover by listing fields not specified and remove it from the schema 1. Retrieve list of fields from property 2. Traverse schema and get list of fields to be removed 3. While traversing also confirm specified fields from property also exist 4. Convert schema by using AvroSchemaFieldRemover Each Avro Record type increments depth and from input depth is represented by '.'. Avro schema is always expected to start with Record type and first record type is depth 0 and won't be represented by '.'. As it's always expected to start with Record type, it's not necessary to disambiguate. After first record type, if it reaches another record type, the prefix of the field name will be "[Record name].". Example: { "namespace": "example.avro", "type": "record", "name": "user", "fields": [ { "name": "name", "type": "string" }, { "name": "favorite_number", "type": [ "int", "null" ] }, { "type": "record", "name": "address", "fields": [ { "name": "city", "type": "string" } ] } ] } If user wants to only choose name and city, the input parameter should be "name,address.city". Note that it is not user.name as first record is depth zero.
        Specified by:
        convertSchema in class AvroToAvroConverterBase
        Throws:
        SchemaConversionException
        See Also:
        AvroToAvroConverterBase.convertSchema(org.apache.avro.Schema, gobblin.configuration.WorkUnitState)
